welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hernando, a charming city known for its quaint downtown and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Olive Branch Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Olive Branch Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network by selecting 'MEM Free WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Millington Regional Jetport Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
